Grave accent in cell:

| A            | B |
|--------------|---|
| <kbd>`</kbd> | C |

Escaped grave accent in inline code in cell (is not an escape):

| A   |
|-----|
| `\` |

“Empty” inline code:

| 1 | 2    | 3  |
|---|------|----|
| a |   `` |    |
| b |   `` | `` |
| c |    ` | `  |
| d |     `|`   |
| e | `\|` |    |
| f |   \| |    |
